api_list.name: Fetch DRP list
api_list.description: Retrieves all the document retention policy details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://icaas.p.rapidapi.com/adminbot/getdrplist"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "icaas.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get asset categories
api_list.description: Retrieves the available list of asset categories in which a user can categorize an asset while uploading it.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://icaas.p.rapidapi.com/asset/getAssetCategories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "icaas.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Fetch asset details
api_list.description: Retrieves all the details associated with an asset in the user accesible node using "assetid" as parameter. The list of assets including asset ID can be retrieved either from Browse API or Simple search API.

required_parameters.name: assetid
required_parameters.description: Unique ID associated with the uploaded file.

api_list.name: Fetch department specific fields
api_list.description: Retrieves form fields specific to a department using "deptid" as parameter. Dependent APIs : 1. "Get department list" API - retrieves all the departments accessible to a user. Note: "deptid" parameter can be retrieved from "Get department list" API.

required_parameters.name: deptid
required_parameters.description: Unique ID associated with a department i.e. a tree inside an organisation.

api_list.name: Get all cabinets
api_list.description: Retrieves the list of nodes accessible to a user in a particular department using "deptid" as parameter. Dependent APIs : 1. "Get department list" API - retrieves all the departments accessible to a user. Note: "deptid" parameter can be retrieved from "Get department list" API.

required_parameters.name: deptid
required_parameters.description: Unique ID associated with a department i.e. a tree inside an organisation.

api_list.name: Get Upload Status
api_list.description:
This API retrieves the status of the upload.
For tracking purpose, the upload API sends an “uploadid” parameter in its response. Using the value of “uploadid”, users can query about the status of their uploads. 
Dependent API :- Asset Upload API

required_parameters.name: uploadid
required_parameters.description: Unique ID of a particular upload which is obtained from the Asset Upload API response
